Text: If anyone is having any trouble with this please tell me so I can try to fix it. This is my first torrent and I would really like to know if it worked right. No haters please, you where new to this once yourself, I'm still trying to learn the ropes. Thank you.

umm you should probably download a ISO maker, (powerISO, UltraISO, ImgBurn, or ISOTools), and then copy the disc file into the ISO program, and then upload the resulting file as a torrent. This works a lot better than installing the program and then uploading the EXE.. because the EXE needs everything else, and, once instaalled, will ONLY work on the device that it was installed on.
i've downloaded it and now it says ' the program cant start because d3dx9_25.dll ' is missing from my computer.. ive re installed it and it still says that! what is going on??
I had The Same problem! Dxl or something like that is missing
